Manage commitments

You can create new commitments here.

Loading...

Title Description Answer Deadline Status
{{ commitment.title }} {{ commitment.description }} {{ commitment.answer }} {{ commitment.deadline }} {{ commitment.status }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Commitment } from '../interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-manage-commitments', templateUrl: './manage-commitments.component.html' }) export class ManageCommitmentsComponent { public commitments: Commitment[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'commitments').subscribe(result => { this.commitments = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } }
